Posts.Content: Jan 2, 2013 02:23PM lisabdcat wrote: Hello, I am new to this site and am looking for a voice of reason.  Went in on Christmas eve for a diagnostic mamo and ultrasound for increased density area on left breast/armpit.  Nothing of concern was found in left breast, but microcalcifications found in right breast.  Magnification mamo done and surgical consult and biopsy recommened "as soon as possible".  Going for Core needle biopsy tommorrow, 1/3/13.  Worried.
Posts.Title: BiRads 4a, Waiting for Biopsy FrayedKnot lisabdcat
